text: Manuel Afonso Correia (born 26 February 1962) is a Portuguese retired footballer who played as a central defender, and is a manager. ==Club career== Born in Seixal, Setúbal District, Correia appeared in 299 Primeira Liga matches during nine seasons, scoring a combined nine goals for F.C. Vizela and G.D. Chaves and also representing F.C. Penafiel. He made his debut in the competition on 26 August 1984 whilst at the service of the first club, in a 1–2 home loss against S.L. Benfica. Correia retired at the end of the 1995–96 campaign at the age of 34, after helping Chaves retain their top level status. He subsequently worked as a manager, being in charge of several sides in the Segunda Liga. ==Personal life== Correia's son, Rui, was also a footballer and a defender. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Seixal Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:Seixal F.C. players Category:O Elvas C.A.D. players Category:F.C. title: Manuel Correia (footballer)
